task.summary: Default task
included bootstrap files, updated comment link using bootstrap style gitignore updated
Edit button style updated
Comment form updated (changed POST button appearance), added search form to the header
Included bootstrap.css in the header instead of @import in style.css. Updated style of post header (color changed)

Updated Nav menu to be more like a bootstrap's standard one. Code formatting in header.php updated. Added filter function in functions.php to replace standard 'current-menu-item' with bootstrap's 'active' class
Old Blog Header tittle removed, no need to keep it, since we have the same in the nav menu. Added link to the main page in the nav menu
Changed color of a-hrefs in the posts' bodies
nav_menu_css_class filter updated, unnecessary code was deleted
Changed post title size in dingle post view
Style of next-post and previous post buttons was updated
Comments style text updated.

Updated edit button style on Sample Page. Added custom_comment_format for the wp_list_comments. Added filter to use bootstrap class for the avatar image Updated style.css for a correct comments representation
Category tags moved to the left, changed color for them, adjusted position.
Style of the comment submit form changed. Updated style of the Name and Email fields in the anonymous comment form
Thene screenshot updated
Cancel reply button style updated
Search form deleted from the search results (in case nothing was actually found). No need to display it since we have the same form included in the header.
Search form moved to the right hand side of the screen
Tags style updated. Moved them to the left side of the screen (right after the categories links). Changed color of the link text
require functions moved to the header of functions.php
added if (! function_exists) checks before executing of the available functions in the functions.php. Code restyled
Created template for Pods ACT page to list all "books".
created template for a single "book" advanced content type
Templates for the Books ACT renamed. Added pagination for the books list page. Added 'Return ti the books list' button on the single book page.
